content: Citigroup Inc  is planning to sell Prime Reinsurance Co  a unit created five years ago when the bank spun off its life insurance business  Primerica Inc   Bloomberg reported.
name: Primerica Inc
title: Citigroup planning to sell Prime Re - Bloomberg
